text: heyy for UOB visa signature the 2k limit is based on absolute spend? or is the limit based on the bonus UNI$ that you'll get?

UOB VS issit can use like PPV because i called their customer service he tell me shopee grabfood dont have bonus UNI$ and all my petrol aiming for 6mpd through ladys  not sure if can hit min 1k spend anot
For the case of UOB visa sig  both are the same. UOB will add all ur qualified transactions at the end of *statement* month and award uni$. So 2k regardless.
For sgd trnx  UOB VS can only be used for contactless. Use your ppv or Citi rewards for shopee etc.
Ah your ppv spend is not offline? If more online spend then you add dbs women then. 4mpd online at 1.5k cap. Can use to buy air tix and book hotel/activities via OTA.

From what I know  either 1-2k on paywave for sgd transactions  or 1-2k on online/in person foreign currency spend for 4mpd. Petrol is not sure. Please read this article as it‚Äôs fairly complicated cardhttps://milelion.com/2024/03/23/review-uob-visa-signature-card/
